title: New: The xx – Chained (John Talabot & Pional Blinded Remix)
body: It’s almost as if CitR has been following **[The xx](https://www.facebook.com/thexx)** on their tour this year, we’re set to see them again in Brixton this Sunday, with **[John Talabot](https://www.facebook.com/pages/John-Talabot/319265671669)** and **[Mmoths](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18323-new-mmoths-for-her-feat-young-sick/ "New: Mmoths – For Her (Feat. Young & Sick)")** supporting. To wet our appetite even more, **John Talabot** and **Pional** have remixed _Coexist_ highlight, _[Chained](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17680-new-the-xx-chained/ "New: The XX – Chained"),_ into a _Blinded by the Lights_ inspired dream. Simple, elegant and touching.
